description: External alterations to the rear (south facing) elevation involving partial removal of existing metal roof and sections of flooring to create lightwell; replacement of existing windows and door with double glazed UPVC windows to the front, rear and side elevation; installation of new first floor windows to the side elevation; and new Render Finish to rear elevation
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission. Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 00-203-P00, 98-202-P00, 98-203-P00, 00-202-P00, 98-101-P00, 98-201-P00, 00-212-P00, 00-201-P00, 00-211-P00, 98-212-P00, 98-211-P00, 98-001-P00  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials and those as described on the plans.  Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(g), and 1.2(f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2015).
